meaningInfo: I mean, they're the leader of Korea already, right? So they have to have a decent chunk of greatness in them already to get that far.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>greatness</kanji> radiates off of the leader of Korea, so much so that you can hardly look. Just when you're about to close your eyes to shield them from the greatness, a great <reading>ea</reading>gle (<ja>い</ja>) soars over them, letting out a cry.
readingInfo: Picture the greatness of the scene before you: the leader of Korea, a great eagle overhead, it's so great!!
